001package org.consensusj.exchange.knowm;
002
003import io.reactivex.rxjava3.annotations.NonNull;
004import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Observable;
005import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Observer;
006import org.consensusj.exchange.CurrencyUnitPair;
007import org.consensusj.exchange.rx.ExchangeRateUpdate;
008import org.consensusj.exchange.rx.PolledObservablePair;
009import org.consensusj.exchange.rx.ReactiveExchange;
010import org.javamoney.moneta.spi.DefaultNumberValue;
011import org.knowm.xchange.Exchange;
012import org.knowm.xchange.ExchangeFactory;
013import org.knowm.xchange.ExchangeSpecification;
014import org.knowm.xchange.currency.CurrencyPair;
015import org.knowm.xchange.dto.marketdata.Ticker;
016import org.knowm.xchange.service.marketdata.MarketDataService;
017import org.slf4j.Logger;
018import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
019
020import javax.money.CurrencyUnit;
021import javax.money.convert.ProviderContext;
022import javax.money.convert.RateType;
023import java.io.IOException;
024import java.util.Collection;
025import java.util.Date;
026import java.util.HashMap;
027import java.util.Map;
028import java.util.function.Supplier;
029
030/**
031 *
032 */
033public class ReactiveKnowmExchangeProvider implements ReactiveExchange {
034    private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(ReactiveKnowmExchangeProvider.class);
035    protected final String exchangeClassName;
036    protected final Map<CurrencyUnit, String> tickerSymbolConversions;
037    protected final Observable<Long> interval;
038    protected final ExchangeSpecification exchangeSpecification;
039    
040    protected final Map<CurrencyUnitPair, MonitoredCurrency> observablePairs = new HashMap<>();
041
042    protected String name;
043    protected ProviderContext providerContext;
044    protected MarketDataService marketDataService;
045
046    private volatile boolean initialized = false;
047    protected Exchange exchange;
048
049    public ReactiveKnowmExchangeProvider(String exchangeClassName,
050                                         Map<CurrencyUnit, String> tickerSymbolConversions,
051                                         Collection<CurrencyUnitPair> pairs,
052                                         Observable<Long> interval) {
053        this(null, exchangeClassName, tickerSymbolConversions, pairs, interval);
054    }
055
056    public ReactiveKnowmExchangeProvider(ExchangeSpecification exchangeSpecification,
057                                         Map<CurrencyUnit, String> tickerSymbolConversions,
058                                         Collection<CurrencyUnitPair> pairs,
059                                         Observable<Long> interval) {
060        this(exchangeSpecification, null, tickerSymbolConversions, pairs, interval);
061    }
062
063    public ReactiveKnowmExchangeProvider(ExchangeSpecification exchangeSpecification,
064                                          String exchangeClassName,
065                                          Map<CurrencyUnit, String> tickerSymbolConversions,
066                                          Collection<CurrencyUnitPair> pairs,
067                                          Observable<Long> interval) {
068        this.exchangeSpecification = exchangeSpecification;
069        if (exchangeSpecification != null) {
070            this.exchangeClassName = exchangeSpecification.getExchangeClassName();
071        } else {
072            this.exchangeClassName = exchangeClassName;
073        }
074        this.tickerSymbolConversions = (tickerSymbolConversions != null) ? tickerSymbolConversions : Map.of();
075        this.interval = interval;
076        for (CurrencyUnitPair pair : pairs) {
077            MonitoredCurrency observablePair = new MonitoredCurrency(pair, xchangePair(pair));
078            observablePairs.put(pair, observablePair);
079        }
080    }
081    
082    private synchronized void initialize()  {
083        if (!initialized) {
084            log.info("initializing, calling createExchange()");
085            // createExchange w/o exchangeSpecification does a remote initialization that takes approximately 1.5 seconds
086            if (exchangeSpecification != null) {
087                exchange = ExchangeFactory.INSTANCE.createExchange(exchangeSpecification);
088            } else {
089                exchange = ExchangeFactory.INSTANCE.createExchange(exchangeClassName);
090            }
091            log.info("initializing, getting name");
092            name = exchange.getExchangeSpecification().getExchangeName();
093            providerContext = ProviderContext.of(name, RateType.DEFERRED);
094            marketDataService = exchange.getMarketDataService();
095            initialized = true;
096            log.info("initialized");
097        }
098        log.info("exiting");
099    }
100
101    @Override
102    public String getName() {
103        return name;
104    }
105
106    @Override
107    public PolledObservablePair getObservablePair(CurrencyUnitPair pair) {
108        return observablePairs.get(pair).observable;
109    }
110
111    protected class MonitoredCurrency {
112        final public CurrencyUnitPair  pair;        // Terminating (target) JavaMoney CurrencyUnit
113        final public CurrencyPair exchangePair;     // XChange currency pair (format used by XChange/exchange)
114        final public PolledObservablePair observable;
115        
116        MonitoredCurrency(CurrencyUnitPair pair, CurrencyPair exchangePair) {
117            this.pair = pair;
118            this.exchangePair = exchangePair;
119            observable = new KnowmObservablePair(pair, this::pollingFunction, interval);
120        }
121
122        public ExchangeRateUpdate pollingFunction() {
123            Ticker ticker = pollForTicker();
124            return tickerMapper(ticker);
125        }
126
127        public Ticker pollForTicker() {
128            try {
129                return marketDataService.getTicker(exchangePair);
130            } catch (IOException e) {
131                throw new RuntimeException(e);
132            }
133        }
134
135        public ExchangeRateUpdate tickerMapper(Ticker ticker) {
136            Date timestamp = ticker.getTimestamp();
137            long time = (timestamp != null) ? timestamp.getTime() : 0;
138            return new ExchangeRateUpdate(pair,
139                    DefaultNumberValue.of(ticker.getBid()),
140                    time);
141        }
142    }
143
144    /**
145     * Subclass PolledObservablePair to lazy initialize exchange on subscribe
146     */
147    private class KnowmObservablePair extends PolledObservablePair {
148
149        /**
150         * @param pair         The currency pair to observe
151         * @param rateSupplier A polling Supplier function (for a single pair)
152         * @param interval     An interval (or equivalent) to provide clock ticks to trigger polling
153         */
154        private KnowmObservablePair(CurrencyUnitPair pair, Supplier<ExchangeRateUpdate> rateSupplier, Observable<Long> interval) {
155            super(pair, rateSupplier, interval);
156        }
157
158
159        @Override
160        protected void subscribeActual(@NonNull Observer<? super ExchangeRateUpdate> observer) {
161            initialize();
162            super.subscribeActual(observer);
163        }
164    }
165
166
167    /**
168     * Map from CurrencyUnitPair to XChange CurrencyPair
169     * tickerSymbolConversions is used to handle cases like ItBit that uses "XBT" instead of "BTC"
170     * @param pair  CurrencyUnitPair using JavaMoney CurrencyUnits
171     * @return  XChange CurrencyPair with exchange-specific symbols if any
172     */
173    protected CurrencyPair xchangePair(CurrencyUnitPair pair) {
174        return new CurrencyPair(convertSymbol(pair.getBase()),
175                convertSymbol(pair.getTarget()));
176    }
177
178    /**
179     * Convert a JavaMoney CurrencyUnit to an XChange currency code string
180     * (This will be exchange-specific (e.g. ItBit uses "XBT" instead of "BTC")
181     * @param currencyUnit A JavaMoney currency unit
182     * @return exchange-specific symbol for the currency
183     */
184    public String convertSymbol(CurrencyUnit currencyUnit) {
185        return tickerSymbolConversions.getOrDefault(currencyUnit, currencyUnit.getCurrencyCode());
186    }
187
188}
